title: Two Apple suppliers are gearing up for car production to win ‘Project Titan’ business
content:
Rumors are spreading that key manufacturers in Apple’s supply chain, Foxconn and Luxshare, are top candidates to produce the Apple Car. The rumors come after both Apple suppliers recently entered the future vehicle market. 

more…

The post Two Apple suppliers are gearing up for car production to win ‘Project Titan’ business appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple suppliers Foxconn and Luxshare are rumored to be top candidates to produce the Apple Car after both have recently joined the EV market.
